alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 6:12PM EDT until July 30 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Thomas County in south central Georgia... Western Brooks County in south central Georgia... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 612 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pavo, or 13 miles northeast of Thomasville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Boston, Pavo, Coolidge, Morven, Barwick, Dixie, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Barney, Dillon, Enon, Patten, Oaklawn, Merrillville, Pidcock and Hollis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
